page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
The main land use in our area is arable.Crops include oil seed rape,wheat,barley,corn,potatoes,peas and sugar beet.The secondary land use is grass which is cut for hay and sil- age.The tertiary land use is pasture for sheep,cattle and horses.
This year,1985, the weather was very poor. We had many wet and windy days during the summer, so that the harvest was late and often flattened. This did not effect the potatoes and sugar beet very much as we had a warm spell during Setember and October which helped them.
